name: Wi-Fi 8 Ball Pool
description:
Call a friend and come play Wi-Fi 8 Ball Pool - The pool game that works over any Wi-Fi connection without spending internet!

Play at will with Wi-Fi 8 Ball Pool:

★ Cross-play ( Android & PC)

★ Play pool as if you were in the biggest championships in the world, we bring you the most modern to produce more realistic physics!

★ Save your data plan, you don't need to be connected to the internet!

★ Go straight to local multiplayer mode and play pool with your friends or challenge players on the same Wi-Fi network!

The Wi-Fi 8 Ball Pool is the world's first Wi-Fi pool game! powered by Unity engine brings the best physics system on the market

Play our free game now and have fun with your friends!

Download the Wi-Fi 8 Ball Pool NOW!
